name: At Last
description:
At Last is a short peaceful walk. You play as Saul, an old recluse monk living on an island. He has to leave. But before, he feels like something is holding him up here...

It is not yet the time. Don't you feel you have unfinished tasks before leaving in peace? —Ferryman to Saul

Say goodbye to Saul's island. Saul’s small journey will take you all over the island and will lead you discovering different ambiances:

  • the abandonned monastery
  • the eerie forest
  • the paisible fields
  • and more...

Controls: use the arrow keys to move the character. 

A short game made in 3 weeks by a team of cheery students: Noémie Crozat, Axel Mounier and Magali Walch.

Music and sound design: Allan Fournier.
